price: (Bagira bati) “Uyu munsi ntihagire umukene n’umwe uwubinjiranamo (umurima).
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
